Sure, here are some additional things you might want to know before diving into Hearthstone:

1. The game is a digital collectible card game in which players build decks of cards around a chosen hero to defeat their opponent. 2. As a new player, you'll start with a basic set of cards, but you can acquire more cards by playing, completing quests, and purchasing card packs with in-game currency. 3. There are different types of cards in the game, such as spells, minions, weapons, and hero cards. Understanding how to use each type of card effectively is key to success. 4. Hearthstone is a turn-based game, which means that both players take turns playing one card at a time until one player's hero is defeated. 5. The game has a ranking system that allows players to climb the ladder and earn rewards by winning matches against other players. 6. There are different game modes in Hearthstone, including casual play, ranked play, and arena mode. Each mode has its own rules and rewards. 7. Finally, Hearthstone has a large and active community, so don't be afraid to seek out advice and tips from other players or online resources.
